attributes.action: Remove Knighthoods and honours from all MP's who have conspired to stop Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: Specifically, any Knighted MP who voted for the Ben Act or the Letwin Amendment.
attributes.background: Members of parliament who have supported Brexit delay have actively laboured against the wishes of the British people as was pronounced during the 2016 EU membership referendum. Any such members who've benefited from the UK honours system deserve to have those honours removed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/having-honours-taken-away-forfeiture
